verses.text: The \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Agur|strong="H0094"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jakeh|strong="H3348"\w*, \add even\add* the \w prophecy|strong="H4853"\w*: the \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w spake|strong="H5002"\w* unto \w Ithiel|strong="H0384"\w*, even unto \w Ithiel|strong="H0384"\w* and \w Ucal|strong="H0401"\w*,
Surely I \add am\add* more \w brutish|strong="H1198"\w* than \add any\add* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and have not the \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*.

I neither \w learned|strong="H3925"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, nor \w have|strong="H3045"\w* the \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*.\f + \fr 30.3 \ft have: Heb. know\f*

Who hath ascended \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, or \w descended|strong="H3381"\w*? who hath \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* in his \w fists|strong="H2651"\w*? who hath \w bound|strong="H6887"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* in a \w garment|strong="H8071"\w*? who hath \w established|strong="H6965"\w* all the \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*? what \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and what \add is\add* his \w son’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, if thou canst \w tell|strong="H3045"\w*?

Every \w word|strong="H0565"\w* of \w God|strong="H0433"\w* \add is\add* \w pure|strong="H6884"\w*: he \add is\add* a \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* unto them that put their \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in him.\f + \fr 30.5 \ft pure: Heb. purified\f*
\w Add|strong="H3254"\w* thou not unto his \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, lest he \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* thee, and thou be found a \w liar|strong="H3576"\w*.

\w Two|strong="H8147"\w* \add things\add* have I \w required|strong="H7592"\w* of thee; \w deny|strong="H4513"\w* me \add them\add* not before I \w die|strong="H4191"\w*:\f + \fr 30.7 \ft deny…: Heb. withhold not from me\f*

Remove \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from me \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w* and \w lies|strong="H1697"\w*: \w give|strong="H5414"\w* me neither \w poverty|strong="H7389"\w* nor \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*; \w feed|strong="H2963"\w* me with \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w convenient|strong="H2706"\w* for me:\f + \fr 30.8 \ft convenient…: Heb. of my allowance\f*

Lest I be \w full|strong="H7646"\w*, and \w deny|strong="H3584"\w* \add thee\add*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? or lest I be \w poor|strong="H3423"\w*, and \w steal|strong="H1589"\w*, and \w take|strong="H8610"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add in vain\add*.\f + \fr 30.9 \ft deny…: Heb. belie thee\f*

\w Accuse|strong="H3960"\w* not a \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* unto his \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, lest he \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* thee, and thou be found \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w*.\f + \fr 30.10 \ft Accuse…: Heb. Hurt not with thy tongue\f*

\add There is\add* a \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \add that\add* \w curseth|strong="H7043"\w* their \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and doth not \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* their \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*.

\add There is\add* a \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \add that are\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* in their own \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \add yet\add* is not \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* from their \w filthiness|strong="H6675"\w*.
\add There is\add* a \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*, O how \w lofty|strong="H7311"\w* are their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*! and their \w eyelids|strong="H6079"\w* are lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w*.

\add There is\add* a \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*, whose \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \add are as\add* \w swords|strong="H2719"\w*, and their jaw \w teeth|strong="H4973"\w* \add as\add* \w knives|strong="H3979"\w*, to \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* from off the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and the \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* from \add among\add* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

The \w horseleach|strong="H5936"\w* hath \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \add crying\add*, \w Give|strong="H3051"\w*, \w give|strong="H3051"\w*. There are \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \add things that\add* are never \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*, \add yea\add*, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \add things\add* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* not, \add It is\add* \w enough|strong="H1952"\w*:\f + \fr 30.15 \ft It is…: Heb. Wealth\f*

The \w grave|strong="H7585"\w*; and the \w barren|strong="H6115"\w* \w womb|strong="H7356"\w*; the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add that\add* is not \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; and the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \add that\add* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* not, \add It is\add* \w enough|strong="H1952"\w*.

The \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \add that\add* \w mocketh|strong="H3932"\w* at \add his\add* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w despiseth|strong="H0936"\w* to \w obey|strong="H3349"\w* \add his\add* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, the \w ravens|strong="H6158"\w* of the \w valley|strong="H5158"\w* shall pick it \w out|strong="H5365"\w*, and the \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w eagles|strong="H5404"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it.\f + \fr 30.17 \ft the valley: or, the brook\f*
There be \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \add things which\add* are too \w wonderful|strong="H6381"\w* for me, yea, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* which I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not:

The \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of an \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* in the \w air|strong="H8064"\w*; the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of a \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w* upon a \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*; the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of a \w ship|strong="H0591"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*; and the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of a \w man|strong="H1397"\w* with a \w maid|strong="H5959"\w*.\f + \fr 30.19 \ft midst: Heb. heart\f*

Such \add is\add* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of an \w adulterous|strong="H5003"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*; she \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w*, and \w wipeth|strong="H4229"\w* her \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w done|strong="H6466"\w* no \w wickedness|strong="H0205"\w*.

For \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \add things\add* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* is \w disquieted|strong="H7264"\w*, and for \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \add which\add* it \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w*:
For a \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* when he \w reigneth|strong="H4427"\w*; and a \w fool|strong="H5036"\w* when he is \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* with \w meat|strong="H3899"\w*;

For an \w odious|strong="H8130"\w* \add woman\add* when she is \w married|strong="H1166"\w*; and an \w handmaid|strong="H8198"\w* that is \w heir|strong="H3423"\w* to her \w mistress|strong="H1404"\w*.

There be \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \add things which are\add* \w little|strong="H6996"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, but they \add are\add* \w exceeding|strong="H2449"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*:\f + \fr 30.24 \ft exceeding…: Heb. wise, made wise\f*

The \w ants|strong="H5244"\w* \add are\add* a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* not \w strong|strong="H5794"\w*, yet they \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* their \w meat|strong="H3899"\w* in the \w summer|strong="H7019"\w*;

The \w conies|strong="H8227"\w* \add are but\add* a \w feeble|strong="H6099"\w* \w folk|strong="H5971"\w*, yet \w make|strong="H7760"\w* they their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* in the \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*;
The \w locusts|strong="H0697"\w* have no \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, yet go they \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* all of them by \w bands|strong="H2686"\w*;\f + \fr 30.27 \ft by…: Heb. gathered together\f*
The \w spider|strong="H8079"\w* taketh \w hold|strong="H8610"\w* with her \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and is in \w kings’|strong="H4428"\w* \w palaces|strong="H1964"\w*.

There be \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \add things\add* which \w go|strong="H6806"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w*, yea, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* are \w comely|strong="H2895"\w* in \w going|strong="H3212"\w*:
A \w lion|strong="H3918"\w* \add which is\add* \w strongest|strong="H1368"\w* among \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, and turneth not \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* any;

A \w greyhound|strong="H4975"\w*; an he \w goat|strong="H8495"\w* \w also|strong="H0176"\w*; and a \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, against whom \add there is\add* no rising \w up|strong="H0510"\w*.\f + \fr 30.31 \ft greyhound: or, horse: Heb. girt in the loins\f*

If thou hast done \w foolishly|strong="H5034"\w* in lifting \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thyself, or if thou hast thought \w evil|strong="H2161"\w*, \add lay\add* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

Surely the \w churning|strong="H4330"\w* of \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* bringeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w butter|strong="H2529"\w*, and the \w wringing|strong="H4330"\w* of the \w nose|strong="H0639"\w* bringeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: so the \w forcing|strong="H4330"\w* of \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* bringeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w strife|strong="H7379"\w*.
